text: Haidergarh is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Haidergarh in the Barabanki district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Haidergarh is one of five assembly constituencies in the Barabanki (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 272 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Baijnath Rawat who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections defeating Samajwadi Party candidate Ram Magan by a margin of 33,520 votes.
